title: Contemporary Luxury Duplex in the Heart of Zoliborz
description: Experience refined living in this extraordinary 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom duplex situated in a prestigious modern development in Zoliborz. Boasting 137 square meters of artfully designed interiors, this residence blends contemporary elegance with innovative comfort—driven by premium fittings, soaring ceilings, and impressive natural light. Soundproof walls ensure private tranquility, while a spacious shared courtyard and secure EV charging station epitomize city convenience. Each room and bathroom features impeccable finishings that reflect Warsaw’s most discerning standards.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in vibrant Zoliborz, the city’s sought-after gem, this home puts you minutes from Warsaw's energetic center. Enjoy unparalleled walkability to renowned schools, lush green spaces, boutique shopping, gourmet dining, and convenient urban transit, all in a neighborhood that knowingly blends tranquility with metropolitan flair. Easily connect throughout Warsaw via extensive public transport, bike lanes, or nearby highways.
lifestyle_benefits: seamless blend of privacy and access
close to leisure, shopping and dining
target_buyer: This property is perfectly suited for ambitious young couples or professionals seeking urban luxury and top connectivity close to Warsaw's iconic city pulse.
market_positioning: This residence sets the standard for premium living in Zoliborz, appealing to buyers valuing comfort, sustainability, and enviable address in one of Warsaw's most desirable modern neighborhoods.
